label: 御伽草子
本: The Moneylenders of Late Medieval Kyoto . University of Hawai'i Press . 2001
説明文: The moneylender Hōsen sponsored a [story chanting] performance at his residence, with aristocratic guests in the audience. As literacy became more common in the late medieval period, people turned to written stories as well, and companion stories emerged as a widely popular genre (p. 199).
